name: Wafee & Wafaa
description:
Liluo Link : https://liluo.io/abdean/wafee-and-wafaa

You are a dog called Wafee " in Arabic : loyal " you go with your companion and your task is to protect her during a walk in the woods for three days, each day a different task !

- Made for GDevelop Game Jam #2

Update log:

August 1, 2022 : A prototype was launched that included only the first chapter !

August 2, 2022 : Fixed smartphone controls, spelling errors, redrawing rocks to fit the engine, Changing the name of the game by adding “The Dog” to give the player an idea of the game, editing splash screen, fixing camera movement when moving to the end scene and adding sound effects from Zapsplat

August 3, 2022: Change the color of the comrade's hair to avoid common creative claim, modify the cinematic scene at the end of the first chapter to match the second chapter, fix the touch screen control, add sound effects from Zapsplat and start developing the second chapter

August 4, 2022: Publishing the second chapter, fixing the touch screen control, removing audio pollution, changing the name and description of the game to suit the content, updating the main menu, adding a name for the companion ( Wafaa ), starting the development of the third and final chapter

( NOT an Completed Game )
